Hydras:

"The backup is on the way" say dryly Hydras 


From: Sandy 
Sent: =
Friday, March 19, 2010 9:15 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: Re: Bla=
ckFortress


  
Upon hearing Hydra's request, Night Shift quickly thinks of=
 a lie on the fly.

"I'd do that but I got carried away. There's nothn' lef=
t of his head. But no worries, I got a trophy ta bring back anyway. There a=
in't no way he's commn' back now. Look I'm still gonna need backup because =
I got a real ticked off crew shootn' at me from this end. Gotta go for now,=
 Night Shift out!"

urge was standing to one side, figitting slightly anxious to go

le, however his commander Cyclonus stood calmly watching both

hile,
>

smiled

 go
> rescue Nightshift."
>

the battle, Scorponok
